verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
His riches in glory far beyond measure,
far beyond measure, far beyond measure.
His riches in glory, far beyond measure,
are thine if thou wilt only believe.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Then trust in the Lord with all of thy heart,
all of thy heart, all of thy heart.
Then trust in the Lord with all of thy heart,
and faith shall be rewarded abundantly.
